subject: broken acceleration pedal
description_text:
Dear Simsonn, i hope this email finds you well.

My name is Emilian and i order a few months ago some Simsonn plus X! Today
evening while playing assetto corsa i broke the acceleration pedal. The
plastic thing holding the senzor between the two side metal plates, the
black one shattered. my acceleration was only at ~52% while not pressing
the pedal, and went all the way up to 100%. can i fix this one? can i order
the specific part i m talking about? if this would be the case, can i but
at least only the acceleration pedal, since i m having all others?

Regards, Emilian.

conversations.body_text: Hi Emilian Hodoroaba,    You can make your purchase at this link and note that you'd like to replace the throttle pedal.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black

ok, that s great. would be there the possibility of you guys selling only
the broke part to me? or like the whole assembly of the senzor?
theoretically the pedals are under warranty, and it would be the best
option for me to get only the broken part, would be a lot cheaper. ofc i
will get the whole pedal if i have no other option, but repairing mine
would be better.
thank again for your help.

Hi Emilian Hodoroaba,     Please provide the order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you the replacement parts for the damaged components, and you can replace them on your side.

order id: 3060663639802618
phone number: +40742923999
contact name: Hodoroaba Emilian
shipping address: Helftheuvelpassage /14H,'s-Hertogenbosch, North Brabant,
Netherlands, 5224AP

I also attached some pictures with the exact same part that got broken, i m
not at home right now and i cannot provide actual pictures. if they are
necessary i can of course send as soon as i get home.
Hi Emilian Hodoroaba,   Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2532800710594181. You can track it at this website:https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2532800710594181

Dear team Simsonn

Thank you for the cooperation. can i ask if i will receive only the
plastic, or it s gonna be the whole sensor. Thank in advance for replying.
I will announce you when i get the package and when I will replace it. Any
way of me showing my appreciation for the company?
Hi Emilian Hodoroaba,  We did ship only the plastic parts yesterday. If you find that the sensor is damaged upon receipt, we will send you a replacement sensor part as well. Please rest assured.
